skills.title: Foundations
skills.description: Worked on projects involving Java, C, Python, and other foundational languages to build a strong understanding of programming concepts, algorithms, and software design principles.

skills.title: Data Analytics
skills.description: Worked on projects using Python (Matplotlib, Plotly, Pandas), Tableau, and Power BI to create interactive visualizations and gain insights from complex datasets.

skills.title: Hardware Design
skills.description: Worked on projects involving Verilog, VHDL, Vivado, and Simulink, focusing on hardware design, FPGA programming, and real-time signal processing.

skills.title: Embedded Systems
skills.description: Worked on projects involving Assembly, FreeRTOS, and microcontroller programming, exploring low-level system design, automation, and real-time applications.

portfolio.title: crypticMagic
portfolio.description: Encrypting and Decrypting files on the terminal using C.

portfolio.title: Animate

portfolio.title: BillReminder
